"Well, my boy, you'll get along wherever you go foot or horse that I'll warrant," said Shin- shin, patting him on the shoulder and taking his feet off the sofa. 
Berg smiled joyously. The count, followed by his guests, went into the drawing room. 
It was just the moment before a big dinner when the assembled guests, expecting the sum- mons to zakuska
